import { Product,products } from './../../products'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-bar', templateUrl: './search-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-bar.component.css'] }) export class SearchBarComponent { searchText: any; products:Product[]=products; }
